net.hockeyapp.android.tasks

Class GetFileSizeTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long>
      • net.hockeyapp.android.tasks.DownloadFileTask
        • net.hockeyapp.android.tasks.GetFileSizeTask

  • public class GetFileSizeTask
extends DownloadFileTask

    Description

    Internal helper class. Determines the size of an externally hosted .apk from the HTTP header.
